name: 1 chronicles
text: These are the sons of Israel; Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun,

name: 1 chronicles
text: Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.

name: 1 chronicles
text: The sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah: which three were born unto him of the daughter of Shua the Canaanitess. And Er, the firstborn of Judah, was evil in the sight of the LORD; and he slew him.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Tamar his daughter in law bore him Pharez and Zerah. All the sons of Judah were five.

name: 1 chronicles
text: The sons of Pharez; Hezron, and Hamul.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the sons of Zerah; Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara: five of them in all.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the sons of Carmi; Achar, the troubler of Israel, who transgressed in the thing accursed.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the sons of Ethan; Azariah.

name: 1 chronicles
text: The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Ram begat Amminadab; and Amminadab begat Nahshon, prince of the children of Judah;

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Nahshon begat Salma, and Salma begat Boaz,

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Boaz begat Obed, and Obed begat Jesse,

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Jesse begat his firstborn Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimma the third,

name: 1 chronicles
text: Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,

name: 1 chronicles
text: Ozem the sixth, David the seventh:

name: 1 chronicles
text: Whose sisters were Zeruiah, and Abigail. And the sons of Zeruiah; Abishai, and Joab, and Asahel, three.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Abigail bare Amasa: and the father of Amasa was Jether the Ishmeelite.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Caleb the son of Hezron begat children of Azubah his wife, and of Jerioth: her sons are these; Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took unto him Ephrath, which bare him Hur.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezaleel.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir the father of Gilead, whom he married when he was threescore years old; and she bare him Segub.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Segub begat Jair, who had three and twenty cities in the land of Gilead.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And he took Geshur, and Aram, with the towns of Jair, from them, with Kenath, and the towns thereof, even threescore cities. All these belonged to the sons of Machir the father of Gilead.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And after that Hezron was dead in Calebephratah, then Abiah Hezron's wife bare him Ashur the father of Tekoa.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were, Ram the firstborn, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, and Ahijah.

name: 1 chronicles
text: Jerahmeel had also another wife, whose name was Atarah; she was the mother of Onam.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerahmeel were, Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the sons of Onam were, Shammai, and Jada. And the sons of Shammai; Nadab and Abishur.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the name of the wife of Abishur was Abihail, and she bare him Ahban, and Molid.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the sons of Nadab; Seled, and Appaim: but Seled died without children.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the sons of Appaim; Ishi. And the sons of Ishi; Sheshan. And the children of Sheshan; Ahlai.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai; Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether died without children.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.

name: 1 chronicles
text: Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian, whose name was Jarha.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant to wife; and she bare him Attai.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Obed begat Jehu, and Jehu begat Azariah,

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Eleasah begat Sisamai, and Sisamai begat Shallum,

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.

name: 1 chronicles
text: Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were, Mesha his firstborn, which was the father of Ziph; and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Shema begat Raham, the father of Jorkoam: and Rekem begat Shammai.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the son of Shammai was Maon: and Maon was the father of Bethzur.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Ephah, Caleb's concubine, bare Haran, and Moza, and Gazez: and Haran begat Gazez.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the sons of Jahdai; Regem, and Jotham, and Gesham, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.

name: 1 chronicles
text: Maachah, Caleb's concubine, bare Sheber, and Tirhanah.

name: 1 chronicles
text: She bare also Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah, and the father of Gibea: and the daughter of Caleb was Achsa.

name: 1 chronicles
text: These were the sons of Caleb the son of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah; Shobal the father of Kirjathjearim.

name: 1 chronicles
text: Salma the father of Bethlehem, Hareph the father of Bethgader.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And Shobal the father of Kirjathjearim had sons; Haroeh, and half of the Manahethites.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the families of Kirjathjearim; the Ithrites, and the Puhites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites; of them came the Zareathites, and the Eshtaulites,

name: 1 chronicles
text: The sons of Salma; Bethlehem, and the Netophathites, Ataroth, the house of Joab, and half of the Manahethites, the Zorites.

name: 1 chronicles
text: And the families of the scribes which dwelt at Jabez; the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and Suchathites. These are the Kenites that came of Hemath, the father of the house of Rechab.
